mapper.sql: id, expression, type, enable, remark, create_date, create_by, del_flag
mapper.select:
select
from erm_dns_private_blacklist where del_flag!=1 and expression = #{expression,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into erm_dns_private_blacklist (id, expression, type, enable, remark, create_date, create_by, del_flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{expression,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into erm_dns_private_blacklist
id,
expression,
type,
enable,
remark,
create_date,
create_by,
del_flag,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update erm_dns_private_blacklist
expression = #{expression,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enable = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update erm_dns_private_blacklist set expression = #{expression,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enable = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from erm_dns_private_blacklist where del_flag!=1
AND `expression` LIKE CONCAT('%','${expression}','%')
